B

Bitmap - Class in Meteor.Graphics
Bitmap is a representation of a region of pixel data as derived from a BufferedImage.
Bitmap(int, int) - Constructor for class Meteor.Graphics.Bitmap
Creates an empty bitmap of specified size.
Bitmap(Bitmap) - Constructor for class Meteor.Graphics.Bitmap
Creates a deep clone of an existing bitmap.
Bitmap(BufferedImage) - Constructor for class Meteor.Graphics.Bitmap
Creates a bitmap from a sample BufferedImage.
Bitmap(int[], int, int) - Constructor for class Meteor.Graphics.Bitmap
Creates a bitmap from existing color data and given size.
BLACK - Static variable in class Meteor.Graphics.Color
Pure black
blitPixel(int, int, int) - Method in class Meteor.Graphics.Context
Sets the color of a single pixel on the context.
BLUE - Static variable in class Meteor.Graphics.Color
Pure blue
